channel.title: Where can i find a "how 2 publish on ham" thing that works?
channel.description:
well ive tried, tried, tried... u get that drift. basically, every time i ask HOW i can find a good ham tut, i get called spammer, people say that im breaking rules blah blah blah, but sum of the kind people tell me to go on the main thread for ham publishing. all it sez there is that ham has "its own step-by-step guide". it doesnt even say how i can FIND that guide. ive just been trying to get my server up for WEEEEKs, and im getting really depressed. plz help a kid! ill make u a mod on the server when its up!!!!
[center][size=30pt][glow=red,2,300]PLZ READ B4 U FLAME ME! [/glow] [/size][/center]

item.title: Where can i find a "how 2 publish on ham" thing that works?
item.dc:creator: @joshioo joshioo
item.description:
@joshioo wrote:

what am i in rong section?
[br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2007, 10:58:55 AM[/size][hr]no wat im saying is stickyd tut not work![br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2007, 10:59:22 AM[/size][hr]can any1 help?
